AI Construction Consultant

Your 24/7 Lean construction expert powered by advanced AI

How can I help you today?

I can analyze your projects, identify waste, suggest improvements, and help implement Lean construction principles.

Analyze Waste

Analyze current waste patterns across my projects and identify the top 3 areas for improvement with specific recommendations.

Forecast Delays

Based on current project data, what are the most likely schedule risks and how can we mitigate them using Lean principles?

5S Assessment

Generate a 5S assessment checklist for my construction site and suggest improvements for each category.

Value Stream

Create a value stream analysis for our material procurement process and identify non-value-adding activities.
